verses.text: A onh anima cajan onh d'a sat lum tic, lajan val cab'an syail icha junoc soldado ma icha junoc checab' yaji.
A junoc checab', snib'ej elanhchamel sq'uik'b'i. A junoc munlajvum, snib'ej elanhchamel scha stojol.
Icha chi' vaj yed' in yaelal tic, ujal svab' syail. Junjun ak'val aynhejoch in cusk'olal.
Ayic tzin ek' jichan, te najat yek' ak'val svab'i. Tzin tzactzaj vek' b'alb'onoc, max sacb'ilaj. Svalan icha tic: ¿Janik' ol in q'ue vaan? xin chi.
Majnaquel in nivanil tic yuj nok' a'ay. Taquinh quechinac sat, slaj q'ue tzililjoc tz'elxi spojoval.
A in q'uinal elanhchamel tz'eq'ui, icha yek' sjul-lab' eb' ch'alvum sjulek' d'a scal sch'al. Van sk'och in q'uinal tic d'a slajvub', manhxa tas ayoch yipoc in k'ool.
Ach in Diosal, nacoti, a jab' in q'uinal tic, lajan icha yic squik'an juneloc quik'. Manhxa b'aq'uinh tzalajk'olal ol in ajoc.
A eb' anima tzin ilan ticnaic, manhxo ol in yil-laj eb'. Ol in sateloc, manhxo ol in ilpaxlaj.
Icha yek' numumoc asun satxicanemi, icha chi' tz'aj satxiem junoc anima ayic sb'at mucchajcan d'a campusante. Manhxa b'aq'uinh ol jaxoc, manhxa b'aq'uinh ol yiloch eb' sk'ab'yoc.
Yuj chi' max yal vem numan, yuj in yaelal yed' in cusk'olal tic, ol valnhej tas svala'.
Mamin ¿tom lajan in icha nok' nivan nok' d'a yol a' mar tzila', yuj chi' aynhejoch a sat d'ayin?
Ayic tzin naani, tecan vach' ol in vay jab'oc d'a in ch'at, tope tz'och vaan jab'oc in yaelal tic yic tzin vay jab'oc, xin chi.
Axo juntzanh vayich xivub'tac tzak' vila', tzin a te xib'tani.
Más vach' tzin a b'inchamoc, más vach' tzin cham d'a yichanh to pitzan in.
Maxtzac techaj vuj svab'i, nab'axonhej pitzan in. Manhxo in ixtej. A in q'uinal tic lajan icha yic squik'an juneloc quik'.
¿Tas quelk'och a onh anima onh tic, yuj chi' tzonh ik'chaanh? ¿Tas yuj tzach och ilk'olal cuuj?
¿Tas yuj aynhejoch a chum d'ayonh d'a junjun k'u, tzonh ak'annhej proval?
¿Tas yuj max iq'uel jab'oc a sat d'ayin, yic syal in b'uk'anem jab'oc yal in ti'?
Ach Dios, Yilumal anima aji. Tato tz'och in mul, ¿tom tzab' syail yuuj? ¿Tas yuj a d'ayin tzak'och ijan a jul-lab'? ¿Tom al vajoch d'ayach icha junoc icatz?
¿Tom maxtzac ak' nivank'olal in mul? ¿Tom maxtzac ak' nivank'olal tastac chucal ix in k'ulej? Toxo val tzin b'atcan d'a yol luum. Ol in a sayeq'ui, manhxo ol in chax uuj, xchi vinhaj Job chi'.
